title: GET_ROPE_FLAGS
content:
0xA80FFE99// GetRopeFlags
int GET_ROPE_FLAGS(int rope);Parameters:rope: The rope to get the flags for.Returns: The rope's flags.enum eRopeFlags
{
    DrawShadowEnabled = 2,
	Breakable = 4,
	RopeUnwindingFront = 8,
	RopeWinding = 32
}
codeBlocks:
enum eRopeFlags
{
    DrawShadowEnabled = 2,
	Breakable = 4,
	RopeUnwindingFront = 8,
	RopeWinding = 32
}
